name: Snowball Jousting
description:
This is just a game I made for the Yogscast Game Jam. It's just as bad as you'd probably expect, maybe even worse. 

It features a singleplayer mode against 3 increasingly difficult opponents as well as a local multiplayer mode. The entire game is made from pure C# and all of the assets used are verified as free to use, including the music. Searching for assets killed a good bit of my time. I'm a programmer, not a visual artist. I did what I could. 

I had plans for an actual tutorial, game sound effects, etc, but I ran up against the deadline.

If anyone plays it I'd be happy to hear what you think. I'm going to go pass out now. Have a nice day.
